channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Winklevoss twins grow $3 billion richer as crypto-trading company Gemini’s stock trades higher
item.description: The cryptocurrency exchange founded by billionaires Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss saw its stock jump more than 20% in a strong public debut.

item.title: I’m 80 and my RMD is $300,000. What the heck am I supposed to do about my huge tax bill?
item.description: A teacher turned $600,000 into $6 million and now has a huge tax bill

item.title: ‘He is increasingly angry’: My troubled son lives with me. How do I ensure he is financially secure after I die?
item.description: “Our family does have a long history of interventions, including hospitalizations.”

item.title: My parents promised to split their estate 50/50, but my mother gave my brother real estate. Is that fair?
item.description: “The trust dictates my brother should receive an equal amount.”

item.title: As Fed nears highly anticipated rate cut, the market ‘really hinges’ on 10-year Treasury yield

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
